name: flight_search
description: Finds flights based on user preferences

name: hotel_search
description: Finds hotels based on destination and dates

name: itinerary_builder
description: Builds a travel itinerary from available data

name: restaurant_recommendation
description: Suggests restaurants based on location and cuisine preferences

name: weather_forecast
description: Provides weather forecast for a given destination and date

name: local_events
description: Finds local events happening at the destination during travel dates

name: sightseeing_service
description: Suggests sightseeing spots in a city

name: currency_conversion
description: Converts currency based on destination country

name: travel_insurance
description: Provides travel insurance options based on trip details

name: visa_requirements
description: Checks visa requirements for a given nationality and destination

name: packing_list_generator
description: Generates a packing list based on destination, weather, and trip duration

name: emergency_contacts
description: Provides emergency contact numbers for the destination country

name: language_translation
description: Translates common phrases to the local language of the destination

name: public_transport_info
description: Provides public transport options and schedules for the destination city

name: photo_spots
description: Suggests the best photo spots in the destination city
